content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Korean

# Target Fragment
dripping faucet

# Context
The kitchen was silent except for the sound. <fragment>dripping faucet</fragment> A single bulb flickered overhead.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Korean

# Target Fragment
stacked crates

# Context
Delivery had arrived early. <fragment>stacked crates</fragment> Labels showed destinations across the city.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Korean

# Target Fragment
quiet determination

# Context
She laced her shoes before dawn. <fragment>quiet determination</fragment> The marathon would start in an hour.
